entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
